content: a simple crochet baby sweater written for folks who can not read crochet patterns this is as easy as it gets written simply worked in almost all half_double_crochet with diagrams included this simple cardigan starts at the neck and is worked in row to the cap sleeves creating a circular yoke then the body is worked down and the edge and collar are added last simple button loops are added this is a quick and easy project that every baby needs in their wardrobe
